Sentencas: In recent research and development, yttria-stabilized zirconia have become increasingly important for many industrial applications such as gas sensors and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation of crack-free nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: In many of these applications, the suppression of uncontrolled gas transport due to porosity or cracks is essential.
Titulo: Preparation of crack-free nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: In this work, the influence of the sintering parameters on the crack formation in n-ZrO2 .
Titulo: Preparation of crack-free nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: 9.5 mol% Y2O3, manufactured by room-temperature compaction of sputtered ZrY nanocrystallites with subsequent oxidation and sintering, was studied.
Titulo: Preparation of crack-free nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: A procedure that enables the production of nearly crack-free fully dense samples is presented.
Titulo: Preparation of crack-free nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia
